group_1.textLeft: Sorry to make you waste your time coming out this @far.

group_1.textRight: I don't mind. It's not like anything was demanding @my time.
So, what's the topic?

group_1.textLeft: The Kamihama Magia Union.
...I would like to hear the thoughts of Miyako, the @leader of the south.

group_1.textRight: Why's that...?

group_1.textLeft: I did not choose to not join because of @Nanaka stopping me.
...The idea of expanding the Automatic @Purification System is by no means bad.
But, there are simply too many people.
An organization that grows that rapidly risks @destroying itself.
So instead I am waiting for it to settle down.

group_1.textRight: Seeing how it goes...

group_1.textLeft: From what I see on the outside, things look stable @now, yes.
How does it actually look from the inside?

group_1.textRight: ...As far as being a mutual aid organization goes, @I'd say it's going well enough.
Sharing Witches and Grief Seeds, mediating any @territory disputes...
We haven't had any problems with anything, really.
Besides, like this we can still share info@and hang out...
...with Magical Girls that don't want to join.

group_1.textLeft: ...Then there are no problems during times of peace.

group_1.textRight: What you're more worried about is what happens @from here on, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, how will you be dealing with these @foreign enemies of ours?
How will you be dealing with groups that do not @join?

group_1.textRight: Just because someone's not joining doesn't mean @we'd drop them.
We'll still be sharing information and helping out @even during a crisis.
...Though, you may have to expect that those that @join would get priority.

group_1.textLeft: That is only natural, yes. There is no reason to @prioritize those that don't join.

group_1.textRight: ...Was there anything else you wanted to ask?

group_1.textLeft: ...If one were to leave after joining, what happens @then?

group_1.textRight: What...? @Like a punishment?

group_1.textLeft: Yes.

group_1.textRight: No one's left yet, so I can't exactly answer that...
But it doesn't have that kind of environment to it.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm...
(An organization built upon mutual good will...)
(That was the impression I had when it was first @established, yes...)
(It's ideal, but remaining on the side is sweeter...)
(With foreign enemies and unexpected situations... @There is risk of it collapsing...)
(If, by chance, the Kamihama Magia Union were to @collapse, even if we did not join...)
(There is still a high possiblity that we would be @caught in the chaos, yes...)
(So in that case, it'd be better to be on the inside @and get that information as soon as possible...)

group_1.textRight: Could you possibly be considering joining?

group_1.textLeft: Surprised?

group_1.textRight: ...I thought your team was against joining.

group_1.textLeft: ...Some things can only be seen from the inside.

group_1.textRight: I see. Then, would you like me to contact Iroha @and the others?

group_1.textLeft: I did not say I will join just yet. I am only musing @that there are things I cannot see.

group_1.textRight: Ahh, that's what you meant...
Well, if you want to just give me the word. I won't @ever turn you down.

group_1.textLeft: I will think on it, yes.

group_1.textCenter: (Though, I will make a suggestion to Nanaka.)
("At least one of us in the team should join them...")
(But it is also necessary to maintain a certain @distance as well.)
